name: Proximi3
description:
This game was made in 3 or so days for a self imposed game jam.

Run around as 1-3 little circles and try to get as close to your target as possible without touching! your target and foe are signified with the colors of your trail.

It can be controlled with: arrow keys, two xbox controllers, wasd, r, n, and the mouse.

Proximi3 was partially inspired by this talk by jonathan blow.

The theme of the jam was "output > input" 

You can find the 3 creators at marty daniels, michael guattery, and johnlee cooper.

Created in unity, using revolutionary 3 player technology.

Have fun!
